unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi and other Tier-1 institutions is crucial for securing top talent. Companies should start planning recruitment drives in advance, ideally by October, considering the placement season rush. We must aim for a diverse cohort, like in *3 Idiots*, fostering innovation. Competitive packages, starting from Rs. 20 LPA, are essential. Streamlining the application process & providing timely feedback are also vital.
